briefTitle: Effect of Platinum-based Versus Non-platinum-based Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy in Triple-negative Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Effect of Platinum-based Versus Non-platinum-based Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy in Triple-negative Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Triple-negative breast cancer
* Stage II and III

Exclusion Criteria:

* Double primaries
* Male breast cancer
* Pregnant or lactating women
* Patients with Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status more than two
* Patients below 18 years old
* Initial surgery of the primary site (excluding diagnostic biopsy)
* Serious concomitant medical illness including clinically significant cardiovascular disease
* Major surgery or trauma in the previous four weeks
